lead_paragraph: Gilles Simon overcame a sloppy start to beat Vasek Pospisil in straight sets and give France a 2-0 lead over Canada in their Davis Cup first-round tie with Yannick Noah as the team's new captain.

headline.print_headline: Davis Cup: France Moves Into 2-0 Lead in Guadeloupe
headline.main: Davis Cup: France Moves Into 2-0 Lead in Guadeloupe

snippet: Gilles Simon overcame a sloppy start to beat Vasek Pospisil in straight sets and give France a 2-0 lead over Canada in their Davis Cup first-round tie with Yannick Noah as the team's new captain....
